ICE ADP

An Exploration of immigration detention average daily population over time. Particular attention is given to the period represented by the COVID-19 pandemic.

Nathan Craig https://ncraig.netlify.app/ (NMSU Anthropology, AVID)
04-25-2021

This is a second post showing immigration detention average daily poulation (ADP) over time. A modest start, but something to consider.

Average daily population (ADP) in US immigration detention FY1979-FY2021 (to date)

Plot of ADP FY1979-2021
